rules: Rule1: If Artist4 violates the rules with their Submission or the Competition is ongoing, then this condition holds.
Rule2: Should Artist3 be featured in an exhibition at the Gallery, then Artist3 gains recognition in the ArtCommunity.
Rule3: If Artist3 is invited to a residency by the ArtFoundation, then Artist3 is featured in an exhibition at the Gallery.
Rule4: Either the Jury launches an investigation into Artist4 or the Organizers initiate a review of Artist4.

Rule5: If the Organizers initiate a review of Artist4, then should it not be true that the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission results in Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury, then Artist4 does not retain eligibility in the Competition.

Rule6: Provided that the Organizers convene an ethical committee for Artist4, then if the Jury launches an investigation into Artist4, then if it is not the case that the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission leads to Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury, then Artist4 does not retain eligibility in the Competition.
Rule7: Either the Organizers convene an ethical committee for Artist4 or the Jury forms an expert panel for Artist4.
Rule8: If Artist1 meets the deadline for Submission, then the Competition is ongoing.
Rule9: Should Artist1 get an extension from the Organizers, then Artist1 qualifies for review by the Jury.
Rule10: Either Artist2 pays the fee to the Competition or Artist2 submits a portfolio to the Jury.
Rule11: Provided that Artist2 submits a portfolio to the Jury, then the Competition is ongoing.
Rule12: Given that Artist3 wins a prize in the Competition, then Artist3 is invited to a residency by the ArtFoundation.
Rule13: If Artist3 wins a prize in the Competition, then Artist3 receives a cash award from the Organizers.
Rule14: Provided that Artist3 wins a prize in the Competition, then Artist3 does not gain recognition in the ArtCommunity.
Rule15: Either Artist3 wins a prize in the Competition or if Artist2 pays the fee to the Competition, then the Competition is ongoing.
Rule16: If it is not the case that Artist1 submits an entry to the Competition or the Competition is ongoing, then Artist1 receives a commendation from the Jury.

Rule17: If it is not the case that Artist4 appealing the decision to the Organizers leads to the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission resulting in Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury, then Artist4 receives a ban from the Competition.

Rule18: Provided that it is not true that Artist4 appealing the decision to the Organizers implies that the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission leads to Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury, then Artist4 does not receive a ban from the Competition.

Rule19: If it is not the case that the Jury forming an expert panel for Artist4 results in the Jury launching an investigation into Artist4 leading to the absence of the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission resulting in Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury implying Artist4 does not retain eligibility in the Competition, then Artist4 takes legal action against the Organizers.

Rule20: Should it not be true that the Jury forming an expert panel for Artist4 implies that the Jury launching an investigation into Artist4 leads to the absence of the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission resulting in Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury implying Artist4 does not retain eligibility in the Competition, then Artist4 does not take legal action against the Organizers.

Rule21: If it is not the case that the absence of Artist4 using AI-generated content in their Artwork implying Artist4 does not violate the rules with their Submission leads to Artist4 facing disqualification by the Jury, then Artist4 retains eligibility in the Competition.
Rule22: Should Artist1 not meet the deadline for Submission, then Artist1 gets an extension from the Organizers.
facts: Fact1: Artist4 uses AI-generated content in their Artwork.
Fact2: Artist4 appeals the decision to the Organizers.
Fact3: Artist1 does not submit an entry to the Competition.
Fact4: Artist4 does not face disqualification by the Jury.
Fact5: Artist1 does not receive a commendation from the Jury.
Fact6: Artist1 does not qualify for review by the Jury.
Fact7: Artist3 does not receive a cash award from the Organizers.
